verses.roman:
timer bṛhadrathas tasmāc
chatānīkaḥ sudāsajaḥ
śatānīkād durdamanas
tasyāpatyaṁ mahīnaraḥ

synonyms: timeḥ—of Timi; bṛhadrathaḥ—Bṛhadratha; tasmāt—from him (Bṛhadratha); śatānīkaḥ—Śatānīka; sudāsa-jaḥ—the son of Sudāsa; śatānīkāt—from Śatānīka; durdamanaḥ—a son named Durdamana; tasya apatyam—his son; mahīnaraḥ—Mahīnara.
translation: From Timi will come Bṛhadratha; from Bṛhadratha, Sudāsa; and from Sudāsa, Śatānīka. From Śatānīka will come Durdamana, and from him will come a son named Mahīnara.
